contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 13, 2000 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (First Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (First Section) 10 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-first-section
Stantonbury Theatre, Milton Keynes, Buckinghamshire, England, UK Bands played an entertainment programme including Gaudete. 14 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Mark Tarry, Flugel, Ratby Co-Op
1st Prize: £350.00 (Secklow trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Scot Meats trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Volkswagen (Gb) trophy)
March 7, 2011, 4:02 p.m. March 7, 2011, 4:03 p.m.
1 Drighlington Band Mark Bentham
2 Ratby Co-operative Band Kevin Steward
3 Bedford Town Band John Berryman
